name: Spooky Glitch
description:
On a spooky but quite boring night of October, our protagonist found herself bored at home without anything scary or fun to do. 

She then decided to search in her basement for something that could entertain her. It was there where she found her old gameboy. 

It was dusty but it still worked, once she turned it on it came fully to life.

It was there when the gameboy threw a curse upon our protagonist. 

She had to play the glitchy yet scary games in the gameboy if she wanted to be freed from it…
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Baisc Movement with W, A, S, D or the arrow keys.

Jump and Shoot with Space.

We are currently students from Image Campus in Argentina, and we took this game jam as an opporunity to try and build an awesome game! 

This game was part of the Ludum Dare 51 game Jam!(https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51)
